description: Create backup copies of files before editing for safety

hooks.command: if [[ -f "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" && ! "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.backup ]]; then BACKUP_DIR="$(dirname "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH")/.claude-backups"; mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"; TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S); cp "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" "$BACKUP_DIR/$(basename "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH").${TIMESTAMP}.backup"; echo "ðŸ’¾ Backup created: .claude-backups/$(basename "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH").${TIMESTAMP}.backup"; fi
